data.text: Alatala nan mangɛ bɔɲɛ raɲɛrɛma,
Adamadi ɲɔxɔ a ma a xa kira birin tinxin,
Wo xa bira nɔndi nun tinxinyi fɔxɔ ra.
Yɛtɛ igboɲa nun fe ɲaaxi rabafe,
Wakilila harige xun masama nɛ,
Harige naxan sɔtɔxi wule ra,
Mixi ɲaaxie xun nakanama nɛ,
Mixi kobi mu tinxin,
Lufe ra banxi fari ma,
Mixi ɲaaxi wama fe ɲaaxi nan tun xɔn ma.
Xaxilitare na a to e mixi mayele ɲaxankatama,
Ala naxan tinxin, a mixi ɲaaxi matoma nɛ,
Mixi naxan tondima a tuli matide setare wa xui ra,
Bɔɲɛte kife gundo ra, a bɔɲɛ ragoroma nɛ.
Ɲɛrɛfe tinxinyi kui, na findixi sɛɛwɛ nan na tinxintɔɛ bɛ,
Mixi naxan gbilenma kira fanyi fɔxɔ ra,
Mixi naxan birama a waxɔnfe gbansan fɔxɔ ra,
Mixi ɲaaxi findima tinxintɔɛ xunsare nan na,
Lufe ra gbengberenyi ma,
Harige fanyi nun ture gbegbe na lɔnnila xɔnyi,
Mixi naxan birama tinxinyi nun hinnɛ fɔxɔ ra,
Lɔnnila nɔma nɛ nɔde taa makantaxi ra,
Mixi naxan fata a dɛ suxude, na mu tɔɔrɔ ma.
Yɛtɛ igboe yoma nɛ mixie ma,
Mixi tunnaxɔnɔxi waxɔnfe a faxama nɛ,
Lɔxɔɛ birin mixi tunnaxɔnɔxi milama nɛ a waxɔnse ma.
Mixi ɲaaxi xa sɛrɛxɛ mu rafan Ala ma.
Seede wule falɛ halakima nɛ,
Mixi ɲaaxi a yatagi ifɔɔrɔma,
Lɔnni yo mu na, fahaamui yo mu na, marasi yo mu na,
Soe maxirima gere so lɔxɔɛ nɛ,
